title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( romaine and leaf ) 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year.
Per capita consumption in pounds is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 14.5 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Per capita consumption in pounds about 10.8 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
Per capita consumption in pounds is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
